{
	"project_name": "{{ settings.projectname }}",
	"selector_type": "{{ settings.selector_type }}",
	"scraping": {
		"url": "{{ settings.url }}",
		"data": [
			{
				"field": "",
				"selector": "",
				"attr": "",
				"default": ""
			}
		],
		{%- for level in [1] recursive %}
		"next": [
			{
				"follow_link": "",
				"scraping": {
					"data": [
						{
							"field": "",
							"selector": "",
							"attr": "",
							"default": ""
						}
					],
					"table": [
						{
							"table_type": "",
							"header": "",
							"prefix": "",
							"suffix": "",
							"selector": "",
							"attr": "",
							"default": ""
						}
					]{%- if level != settings.levels %},{% endif %}
{%- if level != settings.levels %}{{ loop([level+1]) }}{% endif %}
				}
			}
		]
		{%- endfor %}
	}
}
